post.title: Digest - Week 2023/48
post.body:
ㅤ
### [Monaspace](https://monaspace.githubnext.com/)
An innovative superfamily of fonts for code
ㅤ
### [Anatomy Of A Profitable Open-Source Project](https://marmelab.com/blog/2023/11/13/open-source-profit-2.html)
We open the books of react-admin, a profitable open-source project generating almost €1M in revenue. We hope this will assist other open-source developers in building their businesses.
ㅤ
### [Custom Preferences in Salesforce B2C Commerce Cloud: A Developer Guide - The Rhino Inquisitor](https://www.rhino-inquisitor.com/custom-preferences-in-sfcc/)
Learn how to use custom preferences in Salesforce B2C Commerce Cloud to store storefront settings efficiently.
ㅤ
### [Announcing Grok](https://x.ai/)
A research assistant that helps you ask the right questions, find information online and make sense of the world.
ㅤ
### [Boosting Strapi’s performance with Redis, a comprehensive guide. | by Abdelkarim ELAMEL | Nov, 2023 | Medium](https://medium.com/@abdel.elamel/boosting-strapis-performance-with-redis-a-comprehensive-guide-57cb95c5df1c)
In the world of content management systems (CMS), Strapi has emerged as a powerful and flexible solution. However, as your Strapi application scales, optimizing performance becomes crucial. One…
ㅤ
### [bruno - Re-Inventing the API Client](https://www.usebruno.com/)
Bruno is a Fast and Git-Friendly Opensource API client, aimed at revolutionizing the status quo represented by Postman, Insomnia and similar tools out there.
ㅤ
### [RFC0717: Introducing  to  for React Native specific metadata (Take 3) by cipolleschi · Pull Request](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/717)
This RFC introduces and formally discuss the concept of React Native Manifest, a set of metadata about a React Native project (either app or library). This metadata can be consumed by tooling to enhance the developer experience and support the React Native ecosystem.
ㅤ
### [Node.js Mobile | Node.js Mobile](https://nodejs-mobile.github.io/)
Full-fledged Node.js on Android and iOS
post.excerpt: Weekly digest of my readings and interesting topics. Week 48 of 2023.

We open the books of react-admin, a profitable open-source project generating almost €1M in revenue. We hope this will assist other open-source developers in building their businesses. ㅤ

In the world of content management systems (CMS), Strapi has emerged as a powerful and flexible solution. However, as your Strapi application scales, optimizing performance becomes crucial. One… ㅤ

bruno - Re-Inventing the API Client

Bruno is a Fast and Git-Friendly Opensource API client, aimed at revolutionizing the status quo represented by Postman, Insomnia and similar tools out there. ㅤ

RFC0717: Introducing to for React Native specific metadata (Take 3) by cipolleschi · Pull Request

This RFC introduces and formally discuss the concept of React Native Manifest, a set of metadata about a React Native project (either app or library). This metadata can be consumed by tooling to enhance the developer experience and support the React Native ecosystem. ㅤ
